summary:
General Motors is a big American car company based in Detroit. It makes and sells four main car brands: Chevrolet, Buick, GMC, and Cadillac. GM used to be the world's top carmaker for a long time but is now the largest in the U.S. They have factories in many countries and also own parts of Chinese car brands.

The company started in 1908 and grew by buying other car brands. They also worked with NASA to make early electric cars. GM has many other businesses, like OnStar, which helps keep drivers safe. GM plans to stop making cars with gas engines by 2035 to help the environment.
title: General Motors
